00034 #define SQR(x) (x)*(x)

00037 void calcprojectedMBMEmpi(const Projection* P, const ManyBodyOperator* Op,
00038                           const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00039                           Symmetry S, Symmetry Sp,
00040                           void* mbme)
00041 {
00042   // only implemented for some operators
00043 
00044   if (!strncmp(Op->name, "Ovlap", 5)) {
00045     int task = TASKPROJECTOVLAPOD;
00046     BroadcastTask(&task);
00047   } else if (!strncmp(Op->name, "Observables-", 12)) {
00048     int task = TASKPROJECTOBSERVABLESOD;
00049     BroadcastTask(&task);
00050   } else if (!strncmp(Op->name, "EMonopoleFormfactor-", 20)) {
00051     int task = TASKPROJECTMONOPOLEFORMFACTOROD;
00052     BroadcastTask(&task);
00053   } else if (!strncmp(Op->name, "DiagonalDensityMatrixHO-", 24)) {
00054     int task = TASKPROJECTEDDIAGONALDENSITYMATRIXHOOD;
00055     BroadcastTask(&task);
00056   } else {
00057     fprintf(stderr, "No parallelized implementation for this Operator yet !\n");
00058     exit(127);
00059   }
00060 
00061   int size=Op->size;
00062   int dim=Op->dim;
00063   int rank=Op->rank;
00064   complex double (**val)[(rank+1)*size] = mbme;
00065 
00066   SlaterDetAux  X;
00067 
00068   int jmax = P->jmax;
00069   int odd = P->odd;
00070 
00071   // norms of SlaterDets
00072   initSlaterDetAux(Q, &X);
00073   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, &X);
00074   double norm = sqrt(creal(X.ovlap));
00075   
00076   initSlaterDetAux(Qp, &X);
00077   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, &X);
00078   double normp = sqrt(creal(X.ovlap));  
00079 
00080   // set up cm integration
00081   cmintegrationpara cmpara;
00082   initcmintegration(P, Q, Qp, &cmpara);
00083   int ncm = cmpara.n;
00084 
00085   // set up angular momentum integration
00086   angintegrationpara angpara;
00087   initangintegration(P, Q, Qp, S, Sp, &angpara);
00088   int nang = angpara.n;
00089 
00090   int l, r;
00091   int p, j, m, k;
00092 
00093   // set matrix elements to zero
00094   for (p=0; p<=1; p++)
00095     for (j=odd; j<jmax; j=j+2) {
00096       for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2)
00097         for (m=-j; m<=j; m=m+2)
00098           for (l=0; l<dim; l++)
00099             for (r=0; r<=rank; r++)
00100               val[idxpij(jmax,p,j)][idxjmk(j,m,k)][r+l*(rank+1)] = 0.0;
00101     }   
00102 
00103   BroadcastSlaterDet(Q);
00104   BroadcastSlaterDet(Qp);
00105 
00106   // loop over all the orientations
00107   complex double w;
00108   int pi;
00109 
00110   int todo = nang*ncm;
00111   int running=0;
00112   int done=0;
00113   int processor;
00114   MPI_Status status;
00115 
00116   // processor 0 is master
00117   double pos[mpisize][3];
00118   double angle[mpisize][3];
00119   double weight[mpisize];
00120   double projpar[6];
00121   
00122   // which slaves are working, at beginning none
00123   int i;
00124   int working[mpisize];
00125   for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00126     working[i] = 0;
00127 
00128   double weightang, weightcm;
00129   complex double sval[2][(rank+1)*size];
00130 
00131   int next=0;
00132   while (done<todo) {
00133 
00134     if (next<todo && running < mpisize-1) {     // supply slaves with work
00135 
00136       // find empty slave
00137       for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00138         if (!working[i]) {
00139           processor = i;
00140           break;
00141         }
00142 
00143       getcmintegrationpoint(next/nang, &cmpara, pos[processor], &weightcm);
00144       getangintegrationpoint(next%nang, &angpara, &angle[processor][0], &angle[processor][1], &angle[processor][2], &weightang); 
00145 
00146       weight[processor] = 1.0/(2*norm*normp)*weightcm*weightang;
00147       
00148       for (i=0; i<3; i++) projpar[i] = angle[processor][i];
00149       for (i=0; i<3; i++) projpar[i+3] = pos[processor][i];
00150 
00151       MPI_Send(projpar, 6, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT6, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00152 
00153       working[processor] = 1;
00154       running++;
00155       next++;
00156         
00157     } else {                                    // collect results from slaves
00158 
00159       MPI_Recv(sval, 2*(rank+1)*size, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00160                MPI_ANY_SOURCE, TAGMEOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00161       processor = status.MPI_SOURCE;
00162 
00163       for (pi=0; pi<=1; pi++)
00164         for (p=0; p<=1; p++)
00165           for (j=odd; j<jmax; j=j+2)
00166             for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2)
00167               for (m=-j; m<=j; m=m+2) {
00168                 if ((Op-rank !=0 || SymmetryAllowed(S, p, j, m)) &&
00169                     SymmetryAllowed(Sp, p, j, k)) {
00170                   w = weight[processor] * (p && pi%2 ? -1 : 1)*
00171                     (j+1)/(8*SQR(M_PI))*Djmkstar(j,m,k,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00172                   for (l=0; l<dim; l++)
00173                     for (r=0; r<=rank; r++)
00174                       val[idxpij(jmax,p,j)][idxjmk(j,m,k)][r+l*(rank+1)] += w*sval[pi][r+l*(rank+1)];
00175                 }
00176               } 
00177 
00178       working[processor] = 0;
00179       running--;
00180       done++;
00181     }
00182 
00183   }
00184 
00185   // tell slaves we have finished
00186   projpar[0] = -1.0;
00187   for (processor=1; processor<mpisize; processor++) {
00188     MPI_Send(projpar, 6, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT6, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00189   }
00190 
00191 }

00194 void calcprojectedMBMEsmpi(const Projection* P, const ManyBodyOperators* Ops,
00195                            const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00196                            Symmetry S, Symmetry Sp,
00197                            void* mbme)
00198 {
00199   // only implemented for some operators
00200 
00201   if (!strncmp(Ops->name, "OneNucleonOvlaps-", 17)) {
00202     int task = TASKPROJECTONENUCLEONOVLAPSOD;
00203     BroadcastTask(&task);
00204   } else if (!strncmp(Ops->name, "TwoNucleonOvlapsT-", 18)) {
00205     int task = TASKPROJECTTWONUCLEONOVLAPSTOD;
00206     BroadcastTask(&task);
00207   } else if (!strncmp(Ops->name, "TwoNucleonOvlapsY-", 18)) {
00208     int task = TASKPROJECTTWONUCLEONOVLAPSYOD;
00209     BroadcastTask(&task);
00210   } else {
00211     fprintf(stderr, "No parallelized implementation for this Operator yet !\n");
00212     exit(127);
00213   }
00214 
00215   int size=Ops->size;
00216   int dim=Ops->dim;
00217   complex double ***val = mbme;
00218 
00219   SlaterDetAux  X;
00220 
00221   int jmax = P->jmax;
00222   int odd = P->odd;
00223 
00224   // norms of SlaterDets
00225   initSlaterDetAux(Q, &X);
00226   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, &X);
00227   double norm = sqrt(creal(X.ovlap));
00228   
00229   initSlaterDetAux(Qp, &X);
00230   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, &X);
00231   double normp = sqrt(creal(X.ovlap));  
00232 
00233   // set up cm integration
00234   cmintegrationpara cmpara;
00235   initcmintegration(P, Q, Qp, &cmpara);
00236   int ncm = cmpara.n;
00237 
00238   // set up angular momentum integration
00239   angintegrationpara angpara;
00240   initangintegration(P, Q, Qp, S, Sp, &angpara);
00241   int nang = angpara.n;
00242 
00243   int l, r;
00244   int o, p, j, m, k;
00245 
00246   // helpful for indexing matrix elements
00247 
00248   int ranko[Ops->n];
00249   for (o=0; o<Ops->n; o++)
00250     ranko[o] = Ops->Op[o].rank;
00251 
00252   int sizeo[Ops->n];
00253   for (o=0; o<Ops->n; o++)
00254     sizeo[o] = size*(ranko[o]+1);
00255 
00256   int io[Ops->n]; io[0] = 0;
00257   for (o=0; o<Ops->n-1; o++)
00258     io[o+1] = io[o]+sizeo[o];
00259 
00260   int no=0;
00261   for (o=0; o<Ops->n; o++)
00262     no += sizeo[o];
00263 
00264 
00265   // set matrix elements to zero
00266   for (o=0; o<Ops->n; o++)
00267     for (p=0; p<=1; p++)
00268       for (j=odd; j<jmax; j=j+2) {
00269         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2)
00270           for (m=-j; m<=j; m=m+2)
00271             for (l=0; l<dim; l++)
00272               for (r=0; r<=ranko[o]; r++)
00273                 val[o][idxpij(jmax,p,j)][r+l*(ranko[o]+1)+idxjmk(j,m,k)*sizeo[o]] = 0.0;
00274     }   
00275 
00276   BroadcastSlaterDet(Q);
00277   BroadcastSlaterDet(Qp);
00278 
00279   // loop over all the orientations
00280   complex double w;
00281   int pi;
00282 
00283   int todo = nang*ncm;
00284   int running=0;
00285   int done=0;
00286   int processor;
00287   MPI_Status status;
00288 
00289   // processor 0 is master
00290   double pos[mpisize][3];
00291   double angle[mpisize][3];
00292   double weight[mpisize];
00293   double projpar[6];
00294   
00295   // which slaves are working, at beginning none
00296   int i;
00297   int working[mpisize];
00298   for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00299     working[i] = 0;
00300 
00301   double weightang, weightcm;
00302   complex double sval[2][no];
00303 
00304   int next=0;
00305   while (done<todo) {
00306 
00307     if (next<todo && running < mpisize-1) {     // supply slaves with work
00308 
00309       // find empty slave
00310       for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00311         if (!working[i]) {
00312           processor = i;
00313           break;
00314         }
00315 
00316       getcmintegrationpoint(next/nang, &cmpara, pos[processor], &weightcm);
00317       getangintegrationpoint(next%nang, &angpara, &angle[processor][0], &angle[processor][1], &angle[processor][2], &weightang); 
00318 
00319       weight[processor] = 1.0/(2*norm*normp)*weightcm*weightang;
00320       
00321       for (i=0; i<3; i++) projpar[i] = angle[processor][i];
00322       for (i=0; i<3; i++) projpar[i+3] = pos[processor][i];
00323 
00324       MPI_Send(projpar, 6, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT6, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00325 
00326       working[processor] = 1;
00327       running++;
00328       next++;
00329         
00330     } else {                                    // collect results from slaves
00331 
00332       MPI_Recv(sval, 2*no, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00333                MPI_ANY_SOURCE, TAGMEOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00334       processor = status.MPI_SOURCE;
00335 
00336       for (pi=0; pi<=1; pi++)
00337         for (o=0; o<Ops->n; o++)
00338           for (p=0; p<=1; p++)
00339             for (j=odd; j<jmax; j=j+2)
00340               for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2)
00341                 for (m=-j; m<=j; m=m+2) {
00342                   if ((ranko[o] !=0 || SymmetryAllowed(S, p, j, m)) &&
00343                       SymmetryAllowed(Sp, p, j, k)) {
00344                     w = weight[processor] * (p && pi%2 ? -1 : 1)*
00345                       (j+1)/(8*SQR(M_PI))*Djmkstar(j,m,k,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00346                     for (l=0; l<dim; l++)
00347                       for (r=0; r<=ranko[o]; r++)
00348                         val[o][idxpij(jmax,p,j)][r+l*(ranko[o]+1)+idxjmk(j,m,k)*sizeo[o]] += w*sval[pi][r+l*(ranko[o]+1)+io[o]];
00349                   }
00350                 }       
00351 
00352       working[processor] = 0;
00353       running--;
00354       done++;
00355     }
00356 
00357   }
00358 
00359   // tell slaves we have finished
00360   projpar[0] = -1.0;
00361   for (processor=1; processor<mpisize; processor++) {
00362     MPI_Send(projpar, 6, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT6, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00363   }
00364
